text:
[Verse]
Paper boats on a stream
Little dreams sail along
Sunlight on the water gleams
Together we belong

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the breeze
Carried far and wide
Floating on these seas
Joy we can't hide

[Chorus]
Paper boats drifting free
Childhood memories
Paper boats you and me
Endless summer breeze

[Verse 3]
Stars begin to glow
Night fills with song
Paper boats that row
Journey feels so long

[Bridge]
Storms may come and go
We’ll hold tight and steer
In this gentle flow
Worries disappear

[Verse 4]
Softly we will glide
Through the dawn’s light
Side by side
Everything feels right
title: Paper Boats
